metadata.description: Qwen3-TTS preset voices from Alibaba - 9 curated high-quality voices with natural language voice design support
metadata.author: Alibaba Qwen Team

presets.name: Vivian
presets.description: Bright, slightly edgy young female voice with clear articulation and confident delivery. Perfect for modern, dynamic content.
presets.voice_prompt: Bright, slightly edgy young female voice with confident delivery and clear articulation

presets.name: Serena
presets.description: Warm, gentle young female voice with soothing qualities. Ideal for meditation, wellness, and caring content.
presets.voice_prompt: Warm, gentle young female voice with a soothing, caring quality

presets.name: Uncle Fu
presets.description: Seasoned male voice with a low, mellow timbre. Conveys wisdom, experience, and trustworthiness. Great for narration and storytelling.
presets.voice_prompt: Seasoned male voice with a low, mellow timbre conveying wisdom and experience
presets.acting_instructions: wise, measured, thoughtful, authoritative yet warm

presets.name: Dylan
presets.description: Youthful Beijing male voice with a clear, natural timbre. Fresh and relatable for contemporary content.
presets.voice_prompt: Youthful Beijing male voice with a clear, natural timbre and fresh delivery

presets.name: Eric
presets.description: Lively Chengdu male voice with slightly husky brightness. Energetic and charismatic with regional character.
presets.voice_prompt: Lively Chengdu male voice with a slightly husky brightness and charismatic delivery

presets.name: Ryan
presets.description: Dynamic male voice with strong rhythmic drive. Confident and punchy delivery perfect for high-energy content.
presets.voice_prompt: Dynamic male voice with strong rhythmic drive and confident, punchy delivery

presets.name: Aiden
presets.description: Sunny American male voice with a clear midrange. Approachable and optimistic, great for friendly content.
presets.voice_prompt: Sunny American male voice with a clear midrange and approachable, optimistic delivery

presets.name: Ono Anna
presets.description: Playful Japanese female voice with a light, nimble timbre. Charming and expressive for creative content.
presets.voice_prompt: Playful Japanese female voice with a light, nimble timbre and charming expressiveness

presets.name: Sohee
presets.description: Warm Korean female voice with rich emotional depth. Expressive and versatile for heartfelt content.
presets.voice_prompt: Warm Korean female voice with rich emotional depth and expressive versatility
